short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will tell you how much you've earned in real-time from your job today

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find out, in real-time, how much you have earned while working at your computer. This extension will count the seconds you are working and calculate from your annual salary how much you have earned since your start time. You are able to change your salary, start time, end time, how many weeks there are in a year and how many working days you work in a week.
